content.question: What does the brochure say about snow in Nagano?

choices.label: Large amounts can accumulate overnight in the north.
More than ten centimeters a night can fall even in the south.
In November, the snow usually melts quickly.
Snowfall sometimes makes it difficult to access ski resorts.

content.answer: Large amounts can accumulate overnight in the north.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
